item.title: The Scientific computing toolkit for Python
item.description: /*! * * IPython notebook * */ /* CSS font colors for translated ANSI escape sequences */ /* The color values are a mix of http://www.xcolors.net/dl/baskerville-ivorylight and http://www.xcolors.net/dl/euphrasia */ .ansi-black-fg { color: #3E424D; } .ansi-black-bg { background-color: #3E424D; } .ansi-black-intense-fg { color: #282C36; } .ansi-black-intense-bg { background-color: #282C36; } .ansi-red-fg { color: #E75C58; } .ansi-red-bg { background-color: #E75C58; } .ansi-red-intense-fg { color: #B22B31; } .ansi-red-intense-bg { background-color: #B22B31; } .ansi-green-fg { color: #00A250; } .
